[[Image:Silverhill Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Silverhill on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Silverhill''' is a castle in [[the Westerlands]], the region controlled by [[House Lannister]] of [[Casterly Rock]]. The castle is located in the woodlands south-east of Casterly Rock and south of [[Deep Den]]. It is ruled by [[House Serrett]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/casterly-rock/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Casterly Rock entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Silverhill is in the same location. It is assumed to be named for veins of silver located in the nearby hills.
